meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Brad Ritter Patricia Baillif Andy Thomas Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4443.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Brad Ritter, an actor and writer originally from Pueblo, Colorado
Patricia Baillif, a certified public attorney from Dallas, Texas
Andy Thomas, a U.S. Air Force nurse originally from Huntsville, Alabama (whose 1-day cash winnings total $27,100)

tr.td: THE 1840s
BASKETBALL
GET A ROOM!
BIO HAZARD
STRAW

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
